name: capsules for the kittey
description:
created for Sylvie's Jam #1.

game is presently unfinished, and the page is empty, because my carpal tunnel flared up again :( hope to return to this some time.

The goal of the game is to find coins floating in the ocean, bring them back to the central island, use them to purchase a gacha capsule and then bring the capsules to each of the six altars around the world. don't expect any acknowledgement of your success from the game right now! but i will love you forever

controls (Mouse + Keyboard):

WASD to move, mouse to look

Space to Jump

Left mouse button to interact

controls (gamepad):

Left stick to move, right stick to look

A / Cross to Jump

Right Trigger to interact

everyday city life
